Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12762 affecting package json-c for versions less than 0.15-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-12762 affecting package json-c for versions less than 0.15-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package json-c is earlier than 0.15-2, affected by CVE-2020-12762
